body:
https://web.archive.org/web/20201102074801/https://ruqqus.com/@klenvastergan

>@klenvastergan is banned

>This account has been temporarily suspended from Ruqqus. Check back later.

>Reason: Unmarked NSFW is not allowed.

I don't know what he posted.

The admins are known to suspend users for unmarked NSFW content. ([Example 1](https://ruqqus.com/+uslashremoved/post/2tql/moep_ii-banned-for-spam-and-unmarked), [example 2](https://ruqqus.com/+uslashremoved/post/2n7n/cyberpunk2075-temporarily-suspended-for-unarmked-obviously)) I personally think this is a bit harsh, but I'm not familiar with the circumstances here.
body_html:
https://web.archive.org/web/20201102074801/https://ruqqus.com/@klenvastergan

@klenvastergan is banned

This account has been temporarily suspended from Ruqqus. Check back later.

Reason: Unmarked NSFW is not allowed.

I don't know what he posted.

The admins are known to suspend users for unmarked NSFW content. (Example 1, example 2) I personally think this is a bit harsh, but I'm not familiar with the circumstances here.

body:
I know it's against the rules. I'm just saying that it seems a bit harsh to suspend users for it. I'm not sure if he was already repeatedly warned before being suspended though (in my opinion, that would be okay, but I wouldn't want them to suspend anyone for a first offence).

<sup> - sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, **don't** censor my username]</sup>

I know it's against the rules. I'm just saying that it seems a bit harsh to suspend users for it. I'm not sure if he was already repeatedly warned before being suspended though (in my opinion, that would be okay, but I wouldn't want them to suspend anyone for a first offence).

body:
Klen Has been an edgy shit for a while.
  
Honestly find him funny, I used to be like that.
  
I wouldnt be shocked to find out he flirted with rules before. But he's kinda of staple. Credit where credit is due. He stuck out like a sore thumb. Hope this is all something that can be fixed.
  
Wouldnt want the guy gone.

body:
yeh but be honest nsfw, is about "you dont talk about it at work".
  
Not, "dont watch it at work".
  
When the term got invented, the idea of watching porn at work was not even...feasible. Internet was a new born , the idea that people would have supercomputers in their pockets naught but 30 years later....that was laughable.
  
But it happened and this is why etymology is fun.

body:
> "you dont talk about it at work".

So also politics and religion? None of that is tagged and that definition does not fit. NSFW is about displaying the content on a screen. No block of text regardless of its topic gets marked NSFW because it is generally safe to have a block of text on your work screen.
body_html:
"you dont talk about it at work".

So also politics and religion? None of that is tagged and that definition does not fit. NSFW is about displaying the content on a screen. No block of text regardless of its topic gets marked NSFW because it is generally safe to have a block of text on your work screen.

([Example 1](https://ruqqus.com/+uslashremoved/post/2tql/moep_ii-banned-for-spam-and-unmarked), [example 2](https://ruqqus.com/+uslashremoved/post/2n7n/cyberpunk2075-temporarily-suspended-for-unarmked-obviously)) I personally think this is a bit harsh, but I'm not familiar with the circumstances here.

parent.body:
yeh but be honest nsfw, is about "you dont talk about it at work".
  
Not, "dont watch it at work".
  
When the term got invented, the idea of watching porn at work was not even...feasible. Internet was a new born , the idea that people would have supercomputers in their pockets naught but 30 years later....that was laughable.
  
But it happened and this is why etymology is fun.

I know it's against the rules. I'm just saying that it seems a bit harsh to suspend users for it. I'm not sure if he was already repeatedly warned before being suspended though (in my opinion, that would be okay, but I wouldn't want them to suspend anyone for a first offence).

even though NSFW stands for not safe for work, this does not matter, as the term is used to refer to pornography and generally lewd content

this is like replying to "ur mom gay" with "akschually, my mom can not be gay! as that term is used for males who are into their own gender! my mom could in fact be lesbian, but i also am proof she is not!"
